predicate.note: Frames file for 'brainwash' based on survey of sentences in ectb. No verbnet entry. Based frames on urge-58.

example.text: In the past two years , [*] perhaps brainwashed [*] by money management dogma that [*T*] says " the early bird gets the worm , " investors have swarmed like bees for the latest fads , [*] sometimes jumping in even before the true value is known [*] .
